item.title: Core Milestone 6.0.9 Released
item.dc:creator: Geoff Bowers
item.content:encoded:
The complete list of changes for 6.0.x maintenance branch is available online.

Download the ZIP for for the 6.0.9 core milestone here: http://org.farcrycore.s3.amazonaws.com/core/m609.zip

Or alternatively you can update from Subversion (SVN) at this address:
svn checkout https://farcry.jira.com/svn/FC/tags/milestone-6-0-9

Bug

  • [FC-542] - dmimage: image handling in the media library
  • [FC-738] - Replacing an image does not create an archived version
  • [FC-912] - Image Autogeneration requires ftAllowUpload set to True
  • [FC-992] - Resorting Library Items Saves Without Confirmation
  • [FC-1020] - Problems with Image Upload in Media Libary
  • [FC-1066] - Form tool data type image does not validate filtype on upload
  • [FC-1127] - Microsoft Word Templates (.dot) become 4-byte files when trying to view or download
  • [FC-1843] - 'Overview' section: pending draft content does not display
  • [FC-1857] - IE6 Image Library next page error
  • [FC-1944] - Selected elements from library not appearing in parent window
  • [FC-1970] - Objectadmin/pagination bug in overview screens
  • [FC-2012] - Custom type / add new item by related array through library
  • [FC-2013] - Adding image vi a container in library throws error
  • [FC-2019] - Forgot password - generated password is always the same
  • [FC-2083] - array.cfc validate issue when editing user groups
  • [FC-2093] - formtool array rendertype=list cannot be unselected
  • [FC-2128] - Includes not following correct precedence
  • [FC-2165] - If selecting "add" new item in the array form tool, and then cancel - the system will generate (incomplete) objects
  • [FC-2181] - Display problems in IE6 when creating/editing content from the objectAdmin
  • [FC-2226] - object overview jquery tab
  • [FC-2238] - Image formtool errors on cropping/padding when either width or height is set to 0
  • [FC-2244] - dmArchive "preview" shows current object
  • [FC-2270] - Bug setting permissions in scaffold for type classes
  • [FC-2373] - Rule is created twice in the container
  • [FC-2395] - Error when viewing security log: Element STPROPMETADATA.FTLISTDATATYPENAME is undefined in ARGUMENTS.
  • [FC-2399] - User Activity over time page fails
  • [FC-2401] - No option to set default thumbnail image size
  • [FC-2404] - Error uploading new image
  • [FC-2405] - Image library edit - thumbnails won't create if replaced.
  • [FC-2406] - dmFile's property description should be longchar, not string
  • [FC-2407] - Validation for category (ftRenderType="dropdown") don't work
  • [FC-2408] - When restarting installer, structDelete() session.oInstall is needed
  • [FC-2409] - Button "Select Exactly How To Crop Your Image" produces an error
  • [FC-2410] - After selecting an new image via "inline upload", nothing happens (no upload starts)
  • [FC-2411] - Try to add a new image produces a display error in Internet Explorer 8
  • [FC-2416] - Error in css class in /core/tags/formtools/buttonPanel.cfm (p600)
  • [FC-2419] - Linux specific bugs
  • [FC-2420] - image formtool errors when underlying image is missing
  • [FC-2421] - "join" formtool specifies that "checkbox" is a valid render type when it is not
  • [FC-2423] - Content Types that extends farcry.core.packages.types.types gets wrong data in library
  • [FC-2424] - image.cfc - workaround for a missing 'mode' attribute in the <cfimage> tag
  • [FC-2425] - getFUList() fails on postgresql; requires integer setting for bind parameter
  • [FC-2426] - No ability to hide tray when logged in
  • [FC-2427] - Last changes to "longchar.cfc" does break the functionality of the "image.cfc"
  • [FC-2431] - The commited patch revision 11475 broke the "HandpickedRule"
  • [FC-2432] - Error - Editing HandpickedRule - Complex object types cannot be converted to simple values
  • [FC-2433] - New cropping tool for images doesn't work
  • [FC-2440] - object admin JS error on object creation
  • [FC-2441] - Core farLogin displayLogin webskin has incorrect reference to application.fapi.getLink. Referenced as application.getLink

Improvement

  • [FC-1147] - ftlimit should not restrict the total number of characters
  • [FC-2196] - library formtool language is ambiguous; suggested label changes
  • [FC-2402] - Visual image cropping UI
  • [FC-2403] - Option for image quality
  • [FC-2422] - Allow fapi.cfc to be extended in plugins / projects
  • [FC-2435] - Ability to have different public and webtop login urls
  • [FC-2436] - Pagination should include first/last links by default
  • [FC-2437] - Allow formtools.cfc extensions to be used in objectadmin / libraries
  • [FC-2438] - Allow to delete images

Enjoy!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: links to zip files are broken.
Download should be good to go now :)
